pkgmetadata.longdescription: Datasets and Functions to Benchmark Neural Network Packages // Datasets and functions to benchmark (convergence, speed, ease of use) R packages dedicated to regression with neural networks (no classification in this version). The templates for the tested packages are available in the R, R Markdown and HTML formats at https://github.com/pkR-pkR/NNbenchmarkTemplates and https://theairbend3r.github.io/NNbenchmarkWeb/index.html. The submitted article to the R-Journal can be read at https://www.inmodelia.com/gsoc2020.html.
